before-pa.narrative-text-1: I've made it just as the sun is setting.

landscape-view.line-1: After a long time away, I'll finally return home to my whānau.
landscape-view.line-2: I've been travelling for days now, but the pā is just at the end of this valley.
landscape-view.line-3: I'll need to cross the plains...
landscape-view.line-5: ...but first I have to find the correct path through the forest.
landscape-view.line-6: My whanau told me I will come across a secret message: Which rimu tree to look for to find the river crossing.

main.browser-note: A Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox browser is required.
main.browser-recommend: Try using a browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox that is up to date.

main.landscape: Please use your device in landscape mode.
main.length: This experience takes roughly 10 to 20 minutes to complete.
main.problem: Sorry, but we've encountered a problem.
main.start-fern-message: Start at message in ferns leaves
main.title: A DT Puzzle Journey
